# init(avAudioNode:)

**Initializer**

Initializes an audio node from an AVFoundation audio node.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(avAudioNode node: AVAudioNode?)
```

```swift
init(avAudioNode node: AVAudioNode?)
```

## Parameters

- **node**: An [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioNode] object that holds an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioEngine] sound graph from a single sound source or URL.

## Return Value

A newly initialized audio node.

## Initializing Audio Nodes

- **init(fileNamed:)**: Initializes an audio node from an audio asset with the specified filename.
- **init(url:)**: Initializes an audio node from an audio asset with the specified URL.
- **init(coder:)**: Tells you when to initialize an audio node that has been unarchived.
